title: Go is a poor choice of name
body:
by **john.corbett**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

Try to look up go, or any other stop word in a search engine.
Notice the results are garbage.

Please provide any additional information below.

Please do not name your thing after a common term or a term already
strongly associated with something else. Even if you succeed in displacing
a established meaning, you don't win--you just offend people.

Other examples of dumb names, in case you need to be hit over the head with
it: C, C++, X, widget, R, S, NeXT, and processing. I'm sure that now that
you have the idea you can generate more bad names yourself, but please don't.

Thanks,
  John
